statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE prediction_score > 4.5
SELECT retention_label, customer_name FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, prediction_score FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE retention_label = 'High'
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting ORDER BY customer_name DESC, last_purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, prediction_score FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE prediction_score > 80 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC
SELECT MAX(prediction_score) as max_score, MIN(prediction_score) as min_score FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date, retention_label FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE retention_label = 'High' OR retention_label = 'Medium'
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM customers JOIN customer_activity ON customers.customer_id = customer_activity.customer_id WHERE activity_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' OR phone_number IS NULL;

SELECT c.customer_name, ca.activity_type, ca.activity_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_activity ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE c.registration_date < '2020-01-01' AND ca.activity_type = 'Subscription' ORDER BY ca.activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount >= 100;

SELECT behavior_analysis.analysis_id, behavior_analysis.customer_id, customer_data.first_name, behavior_analysis.prediction_result, behavior_analysis.prediction_accuracy FROM behavior_analysis INNER JOIN customer_data ON behavior_analysis.customer_id = customer_data.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, prediction_result FROM behavior_analysis WHERE prediction_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT prediction_id, customer_id, predicted_behavior FROM Predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, predicted_behavior FROM Predictions WHERE predicted_behavior LIKE '%loyal%'
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchases > 2

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Purchases.purchase_amount, Purchases.purchase_date FROM Customers INNER JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE Customers.birthdate < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY Purchases.purchase_amount DESC
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Interactions.interaction_date FROM Customers JOIN Interactions ON Customers.customer_id = Interactions.customer_id WHERE Interactions.interaction_type = 'Email'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, registration_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT p.product_name, p.category, pr.price FROM products p JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id WHERE pu.total_amount > 1000
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pr.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY c.customer_name
